name: AI In The Sky
description:
A rogue AI has taken over the city, and it is up to you to save it.
All you have at your disposal is a shotgun, a grapple hook, and the ability to run on walls.

Press ESC to pull up the pause menu (The rest of the controls are explained in-game).

(Known bug: Deaths sometimes will not be counted. My apologies!)

Music By: zSubZer0 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRCbd8TwhNXt1KTc6p5MBog

Game By: pl0s

Development is not over! You can follow future updates here: https://discord.gg/XbHu7b8jty
